detail.fieldTitleHelpTextInternalId: Saved in the order process and useful for further processes to know which discount groups were applied.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextPriority: The priority determines which discount should be applied first. The higher the priority, the earlier the discount is applied. This is also particularly relevant when discounts are given as a percentage.
detail.fieldTitleLabelListPriceType: How should the list price and savings be presented?
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextLabelCalculationBase:
Example "Product price":
    Product price: € 100,-
    List price € 120,-
    Percentage discount: 50%
    Result sale price: € 50,-

Example "List price":
    Product price: € 100,-
    List price € 120,-
    Percentage discount: 50%
    Result sale price: € 60,-

Example "RRP" (ACRIS RRP plugin):
    Product price: € 100,-
    List price € 120,-
    RRP € 180,-
    Percentage discount: 50%
    Result sale price: € 90,-
detail.fieldTitleLabelRrpTax: Calculation based on RRP gross / net
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextCalculationType: The discount group will assign discount or surcharge based on selected option.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextActive: If discount group is active then it will be used at Storefront.
detail.rulesSelectFieldHelpText: The discount rule becomes active if one of the specified rules matches (OR link). If no rule is selected, the discount is always calculated for the products assigned to the dynamic product group.
detail.productStreamsSelectFieldHelpText: The discount is applied if one of the dynamic product groups applies (OR link).
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextCustomerAssignmentType: The discount group will be assigned to the customer with one of the selected assignment type.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextCustomer: The discount group will be assigned to the selected customer.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextProductAssignmentType: The discount group will be assigned to the product with one of the selected assignment type.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextProduct: The discount group will be assigned to the selected product.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextMaterialGroupProduct: The merchandise group (discount group) can be used via the ACRIS plugin to allow all products with the same merchandise group (discount group) to receive a discount.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextMaterialGroupCustomer: The customer discount group can be used via the ACRIS plugin to allow multiple customers with the same customer discount group to receive a discount.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextInternalName: The discount group internal name will be displayed at discount group listing page in Administration.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextMaxQuantity: If "To" is left blank, there is no upper limit for the discount.
detail.fieldTitlePlaceholderDisplayName: Enter display name of discount group...
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextDisplayName: The name is output on the product detail page if the display of price scales has been activated in the plugin settings.
detail.customerAssignmentOptionEveryCustomer: Use for all customers (registered or unregistered)
detail.listPriceOptionIgnore: List price available on the product: display this. - If there is no list price on the product: do not display one.
detail.listPriceOptionRrp: RRP available on the product: display this. - If there is no RRP on the product: do not display one.
detail.listPriceOptionSet: List price available on the product: display this. - If there is no list price on the product: display the original product price as the list price.
detail.listPriceOptionSetRrp: RRP available on the product: display this. - If there is no RRP on the product: display the original product price as the list price.
detail.listPriceOptionSetPrice: Always display the original selling price of the product as the list price, even if the product has its own list price or RRP.
detail.listPriceOptionPurchasePrice: Purchase price available on the product: display this. - If there is no Purchase price on the product: do not display one.
detail.listPriceOptionRemove: Do not display a list price.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextExcluded: The discounts with lower priority will be excluded from price calculation for the product. The exclusion is without regard to sliding scale discounts.
detail.calculationBaseOptionRrp: RRP (Fallback: Product price) (From ACRIS RRP plugin)
detail.rrpTaxOptionGross: Calculation always based on the gross RRP
detail.rrpTaxOptionNet: Calculation always based on the net RRP

detail.acrisRrpPluginAlert: Important: To ensure functionality, the "ACRIS RRP" plugin must also be installed and activated.
